thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Chanelle Stowe
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Chanelle Stowe

author: Chanelle Stowe
title: Chanelle Stowe
text:
I have been looking a while for an unique engagement ring. Erika provided great customer service with great recommendations and regular communication that put me at ease. I can not recommend this company enough from start to finish. The gemstones are captured to their true appearance in the images the 3D modelling helps with visualising what your item will look like in real life. I would recommend this company to everyone.
Thank you from Chanelle (Australia)
